escrowFunds(bytes,bytes).notice: The function shall verify the json's autheticity, that the order was not already submitted. Then, check the validity of the source chain id and escrow the user's tokens.

restituateFunds(bytes32).notice: The function shall return the locked funds of the solver to the owner address
